content.p: The OpenAMQ source code and executables, the AMQP specifications, this web site, and all other related materials and information are currently restricted for use by JPMC personnel, members of the OpenAMQ development team, and third parties that have signed a non-disclosure agreement with JPMC or otherwise committed to maintaining the confidentiality of this project.
OpenAMQ is intended to be licensed as an open source product under the terms of the Apache License, version 2.0. Note that this license DOES NOT APPLY to OpenAMQ at present.

OpenAMQ is under development and the current versions of the software are likely to be unstable and insufficiently tested for production use. While we welcome all feedback on the software and specifications, the software should not be used for live data until it has been officially released as a 1.0 version.
